get.summary: Process barcode data for baggage recheck
get.description: Processes barcode scan data to determine if baggage recheck is required. First checks TagRecheck table, then DepartureMovementView if not found.

parameters.name: seatNumber
parameters.description: Seat number (e.g., 15F, 009F - leading zeros will be handled)

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Language code for response message (EN, VI, KO, ZH)

message.example: Please proceed to the recheck counter at H
No matching records found for the provided barcode data
Missing required parameters: airline, flightNumber, flightDate

get.description: Returns statistics for baggage recheck operations on a specific date

get.summary: Get recheck records by counter and date
get.description: Returns all recheck records for a specific counter on a specific date
